name: Food Popper
description:
A simple yet endlessly engaging fruit ninja inspired personal game project I made in Unity.

Game controls

Swipe to destroy food but don't explode 2 bombs or you lose. If you miss food 3 times, you lose. Try your best to survive in hard difficulty. :)

What I worked on

  • Conceived and prototyped multiple physics-based abilities
  • Designed 3 levels of varying difficulty
  • Designed and implemented a pause menu, score system, life system and UI menus to make the game dun and challenging.
  • Wrote editor tools for level design
  • Programmed all game mechanics and UI mechanics in C# in unity
  • Implemented a high score system which show your highest score for the current session upon losing.
